resources.string: The (India) Declaration of Independence was adopted in 1947.
The Supreme law of the land is the Constitution.
The two rights in the Declaration of Independence: \n \tlife \n \tpursit of happiness.
Freedom for religion means: \n \tYou can practice any religion, or not practice a religion.
Journalists is one branch or part of the government.
Congress does not make federal laws.
There are one hundred (100) U.S. Senators.
